body: @heavenbuster Not sure if you're still around or if you'll ever read this but yeah, I agree with what you said. Small details like that do matter but I guess the artist doesn't have the time to keep track of all the small details.
I mean she says married, but like at no point does she have a ring on, not even during the work scenes. I kinda like the small details like that when it comes to married ones like this.
Author-san and his/her godly drawing again <3
For such an average man, dude is fucking ripped.
